到達目標: 英文欄参照/Refer to the following
特記事項:
本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。
The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法: This course is centered mainly on discussions of course topics and texts. This is NOT a lecture style course, it requires interactive English only discussions with classmates every lesson. We will participate in frequent pair and small group work and collaboration. We will also create small presentations and projects. Assignments may require the use of a computer and online sites.

第1回:
All classes will be face-to-face format
Week 1: Introductions and Class Rules, Student Background Survey
Unit 7
トピック.授業計画1: Course sessions listed above are subject to change in accordance to student needs, any changes to the university calendar, and any external situation affecting the university.
